name: Stock game 2
description:
It is build to let you to have the fellin' of making money and becoming a billionaire from having nothing. It is a rag to the riches game.It is written in C++ so it is not possible to have graphics yet(actually, I can but that will only be limited to shity graphics, so no graphic is better than shitty graphic!), i just want people to try this game. Thanks !

Features:

Helpers which will show you how much money you have won!

You can also play lotteries!!

you can do cheats!

You can customize your game, it's fun!!

You can get loans!

Please go to http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.as... to download the Microsoft Visual Studio package to run this game, Thanks!

*Notes

My name is Toby Lam If you have any ideas. Send an email to greenone092@gmail.com. Thx!
